certificates.description: This certificate confirms that the crew member has successfully completed the STCW Basic Safety Training, covering firefighting, survival techniques, and first aid.
This certificate indicates that the crew member has received training in advanced firefighting techniques, including the use of breathing apparatus and firefighting strategies.
This certificate demonstrates the crew memberâ€™s competence in providing first aid and managing medical emergencies on board.

certificates.certificateName: Proficiency in Survival Craft and Rescue Boats
certificates.description: This certificate confirms that the crew member is proficient in handling survival craft and rescue boats, including launching and operating them in emergency situations.
This certificate ensures that the crew member is aware of the maritime security threats and the necessary procedures to maintain security on board.
